definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to Saint Francis of Assisi .
Of or pertaining to ( Roman Catholicism ) the Order of the Friars Minor , or ( Protestantism , Roman Catholicism ) to another religious order based on the rule of Francis of Assisi's original order.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to Saint Francis of Assisi .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to ( Roman Catholicism ) the Order of the Friars Minor , or ( Protestantism , Roman Catholicism ) to another religious order based on the rule of Francis of Assisi's original order.
